definitions.title: vb. bore, pick, dig
definitions.body: (NH id., Aram. [[נְקַר]] nqar id.; Ar. naqara perforate, bore out, hollow out Lane:2838; Eth. naqura: be one-eyed Di:645);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf 3 mpl. sf. [[יִקְּרוּהָ]] Pr 30:17; Inf. [[נְקוֹר]] 1Sa 11:3, both of boring, or picking out eye (acc.).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf.. 2 ms. [[תְּנַקֵּד]] Nu 16:14 (JE), 3 mpl. [[וַיְנַקְּרוּ]] Ju Jdg 16:21 both of boring out eyes (acc.); Pf. 3 ms. [[נִקַּר]] Job 30:17 he (or it, i.e. the night) boreth my bones [[מֵעָלָָי]] (of effects of elephantiasis; Bu rds. [[נֻקַּר]]).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 mpl. [[נֻקַּרְתֶּם]] Is 51:1 the quarry (fr. wh.) ye were digged.
